languages.text: Особые способности настолько сильны, что их восстановление требует длительного времени. Используя Особые способности в бою, помните, что их шкала может не восстановиться к тому моменту, когда вы вступите в следующее сражение.

Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.
languages.original_text: Особые способности настолько сильны, что их восстановление требует длительного времени. Используя Особые способности в бою, помните, что их шкала может не восстановиться к тому моменту, когда вы вступите в следующее сражение.

traits.locale_text: Ultimate abilities are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using ultimate abilities, remember that their cooldown bar might not fill by the time you enter your next battle.

Ultimate abilities are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using ultimate abilities, remember that their cooldown bar might not fill by the time you enter your next battle.
Ultimate abilities are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using ultimate abilities, be aware that they may still be on cooldown the next time you enter battle.

Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.

Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.

languages.text: Las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} definitivas son tan poderosas que su tiempo de recarga es mucho más largo. Al usar una de tus {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacidades definitivas{/g}, ten en cuenta que podría seguir en tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} cuando empiece la siguiente batalla.
languages.original_text: Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.

traits.locale_text: Las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} definitivas son tan poderosas que su tiempo de recarga es mucho más largo. Al usar una de tus {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacidades definitivas{/g}, ten en cuenta que podría seguir en tiempo de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g} cuando empiece la siguiente batalla.

languages.text: 究極{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は非常に強力なので、再チャージにかなり長い時間がかかる。{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}究極アビリティ{/g}を使用する際は、次に戦闘に参加する際に{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}が残っている可能性があることに注意しよう。
languages.original_text: Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.

traits.locale_text: 究極{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は非常に強力なので、リチャージにかなり長い時間がかかる。{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}究極アビリティ{/g}を使用する際は、次に戦闘に参加する際に{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}が残っている可能性があることに注意しよう。

languages.text: 终极{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}非常强大，需要的充能时间也非常长。请注意，当您使用完{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}终极能力{/g}之后，可能等到下次战斗的时候，终极能力依然处于{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.

traits.locale_text: 终极{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}非常强大，需要的充能时间也非常长。请注意，当您使用完{g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}终极能力{/g}之后，可能等到下次战斗的时候，终极能力依然处于{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却{/g}状态。

languages.text: Ultimative {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} sind so mächtig, dass es deutlich länger dauert, bis sie wieder aufgeladen sind. Wenn du {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimative Fähigkeiten{/g} einsetzt, musst du bedenken, dass sie beim nächsten Mal, wenn du in den Kampf ziehst, vielleicht immer noch auf {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} sind.
languages.original_text: Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.

traits.locale_text: Ultimative {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} sind so mächtig, dass es deutlich länger dauert, bis sie wieder aufgeladen sind. Wenn du {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimative Fähigkeiten{/g} einsetzt, musst du bedenken, dass sie beim nächsten Mal, wenn du in den Kampf ziehst, vielleicht immer noch auf {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} sind.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} ultimes sont si puissantes qu'elles mettent beaucoup plus de temps à se recharger. Lorsque vous utilisez des {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacités ultimes{/g}, n'oubliez pas qu'elles peuvent être en phase de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recharge{/g} lors du combat suivant.
languages.original_text: Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} ultimes sont si puissantes qu'elles mettent beaucoup plus de temps à se recharger. Lorsque vous utilisez des {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}capacités ultimes{/g}, n'oubliez pas qu'elles peuvent être en phase de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}récupération{/g} lors du combat suivant.

languages.text: Üstün {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g} o denli güçlüdürler ki dolarak yeniden kullanılabilir hâle gelmeleri ciddi zaman alır. {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}Üstün kabiliyetleri{/g} kullanırken, bir sonraki çatışmaya girdiğinde {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresinin{/g} hâlâ bitmemiş olabileceğini unutma.
languages.original_text: Ultimate {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are so powerful that they take a significantly longer time to recharge. When using {g|Encyclopedia:UltimateAbilities}ultimate abilities{/g}, be aware that they may still be on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} the next time you enter battle.
